Now it won't work at all.  Seems to be mfg'ed completely of plastic...a toy.

Reviews.Title: ok but not great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This camera would be a good choice if you were going to use it primarily outdoors and in the daytime.  But when you need to use the flash there is a delay...sometimes eight to ten seconds...before you can take another picture!  That doesn't seem like a long time until you are waiting to take a picture...and waiting...and waiting.  Picture quality is pretty good and some of the other features are good.  Batteries don't last long, definitely would need rechargables or you will be spending tons on batteries.  I ultimately sent the camera back...will see how that goes!

Reviews.Title: The best Camera for a low price
Reviews.Author: Franklin Abraham "aledark"
Reviews.Content: it's a really good camera but there are some details that you need to know:AA bateries (bad)medium to low quality in really dark and low light conditions (bad)does not come with a decent bag it's just a white paper (bad)5X optical zoom plus 3X digital zoom (good)uses SD cards up to 2GB and HCSD cards class 4 (good)the box is really little so expect a low charge on courier users.

Reviews.Title: Performance at a bargain
Reviews.Author: AA
Reviews.Content: What a great camera at any price and that it was only $99 makes it THE bargain out there, and I looked for a while.The 5x zoom is great and Panasonic has extended zoom which goes up to almost 8x on this camera.On the down side its a bit slow between pictures but that might be because I haven't read the manual yet as there are so many features.

Reviews.Title: what a great camera!
Reviews.Author: Martha Joan Case
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific camera! It is so easy to use and the instructions are very easy to follow.  I love it!  The only negative comment I have is that the AA batteries wear down very quickly even with the camera turned off.  It is best to get rechargable batteries or take them out of the camera when you aren't using it.

Reviews.Title: Christmas delight
Reviews.Author: Courtney E. Christensen "broad spectrum nerd"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as my husband's Christmas present.  He intends to take it on hikes, but it has only been backstage with him so far.  It seems to take good pictures, but we haven't yet put it through the paces.

Reviews.Title: Loved it for 7 months
Reviews.Author: J. Summerell
Reviews.Content: This camera was fantastic for the 7 months that it worked. It completely stopped working in early January after not having been dropped and receiving no rough handling. I am giving this product 2 stars in order to alert consumers to buy NOTHING from Panasonic. I was instructed to ship everything to their service center in McAllen, TX, which I did. Thank goodness I used UPS and had the package insured. Panasonic has no record of the case number they generated for my problem, cannot find me in the system when I call, and when I give them the model number information for this camera they inform me that this model cannot be received into the system because it's no longer in production. I had been told I would receive a replacement within 10 days of their receipt of my unit, but I don't expect to ever receive a thing at this point. My phone calls are met with rudeness and when I ask to speak to a manager I'm informed that they're all "in a meeting." I demanded a new camera be shipped to me and was informed that since my camera hasn't technically been received by them, regardless of tracking information, they will send me nothing.Seriously. Buy nothing from this company. I just ordered a low end Cannon so I won't miss anymore weeks of my 9 month old son's life.

Reviews.Title: My new camera
Reviews.Author: J. Watson "hiking diva"
Reviews.Content: I like it alot.  Very cool look...althought digital has a vintage feel to it.  Nice big screen in the back.  Easy to figure out without reading instructions.  It has it's limitations like any device but, over-all a worthwhile purchase.

Reviews.Title: Somehow disappointed ..
Reviews.Author: M. Harvey "Harvey"
Reviews.Content: Pros:  + Price.  + 5X Optical Zoom.  + Slim & fits well in hand.  + Photo quality.  + Ease of use.Cons:  - A bit slow (Auto) focus.  - Slow start up.  - Only 2 steps from Optical zoom to Digital zoom.  - The black plastic body makes it looks cheap.Other Thoughts: Would I buy it again? "No"

Reviews.Title: Over priced camera
Reviews.Author: Rich K
Reviews.Content: There is nothing wrong with the camera.  The product was way over priced by about $4I don't think I will use your service again.A unhappy person.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed, returning it!
Reviews.Author: K. Hightree
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take pictures at my sisters wedding.  My sister-in-law has a Panasonic and has taken some really nice photos with it, so I thought I would buy one and try it.  Was I ever disappointed. The time between taking the picture and when the screen comes back up is like 8 seconds. Not good when you are trying to take photos at a wedding. Also there were these little white spots on some of the pictures that I have since found out are dust spots. Also it takes forever to focus in a low light situation. The only good thing I can say about this camera is that it takes really good photos outside in good light. Detail is awesome. However that doesn't make up for what it doesn't do. I'm returning mine!!

Reviews.Title: Fast Service
Reviews.Author: G. G Papas
Reviews.Content: Received Item in one day by FedEx .Shipping was free and price was good.Would again go to Beach Camera.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good little camera
Reviews.Author: Marsha "oufootballfan"
Reviews.Content: I've only used this camera two or three times, but so far I really like it. I'm reserving full judgement until I've had it awhile longer. I have had a problem with some point and shoot cameras not holding up well--especially the Nikon P5100.

Reviews.Title: Absolute dud!
Reviews.Author: M. Nagendraprasad "Naghi Prasad"
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd camera in the last 6 years and by far this is the worst experience. The focus is not reliable. The usage is not intuitive. The redeye reduction barely works. The eyes in the picture look glazed.I used this for my daughter's fifth birthday and I luckly also had a Cannon video camera taking shots. If I just relied on this camera, it would have been a disaster!

Reviews.Title: BEACH CAMERA - do not order from them
Reviews.Author: Teddy W. Raper
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera, shipped and sold by Beach Camera.  Long story short, I never got it because their delivery people (and I paid for expedited shipping!)left it somewhere and got no delivery signature.  And now, they're telling me it's going to take 15 days to "investigate".  Do yourself a favor, if you want this camera, DO NOT ORDEF IT FROM BEACH CAMERA!
